name: KeyboardAccessoryView
description: View that allows replacing the default keyboard with other components

props.name: renderContent
props.description: Content to be rendered above the keyboard

props.name: kbInputRef
props.description: The reference to the actual text input (or the keyboard may not reset when instructed to, etc.).

props.name: kbComponent
props.description: The keyboard ID (the componentID sent to KeyboardRegistry)

props.name: kbInitialProps
props.description: The props that will be sent to the KeyboardComponent

props.name: onHeightChanged
props.description: A callback for when the height is changed

props.name: onItemSelected
props.description: Callback that will be called when an item on the keyboard has been pressed.

props.name: onRequestShowKeyboard
props.description: Callback that will be called if KeyboardRegistry.requestShowKeyboard is called.

props.name: onKeyboardResigned
props.description: Callback that will be called once the keyboard has been closed
